NAME: ZZZ(notgame):[bios] Atari Jaguar
NAME_ZH: ZZZ（非游戏）：[BIOS] 雅达利捷豹

NAME: Air Cars
DESC:
AirCars takes place in the future after a nuclear holocaust. 
The large organization E.B.N.E.R.S. is plotting to take over the world and has developed advanced forcefield and teleportation systems, and nuclear powered AirCars. To stop the plot, your group steals plans, builds its own AirCar, and sets out to destroy all of the bases, 28 known and countless unknown ones, stationed around the globe.
You can choose to play a single player game, the 2-player game using a JagLink, or up to 8 players using ICD's CatBoxes. On screen and on radar, each player's AirCar is displayed in a different color to help identify the good guys from the bad guys. There are 3 difficulty settings. You will be using the cockpit's instrument panel to fly the AirCar, select weapons and view radar, as well as combating the enemy in the air and shooting ground targets.
Features include true 3D sound, a computer voice (which can be turned off if desired), and music during the introduction and level intermissions.
DESC_ZH:
《空中汽车》的故事发生在核浩劫后的未来。
大型组织 E.B.N.E.R.S. 正密谋接管世界，他们研发了先进的力场和传送系统，以及核动力的空中汽车。为了阻止这一阴谋，你的团队窃取了设计图，制造了自己的空中汽车，并出发去摧毁全球各地的所有基地，已知的有 28 个，还有无数未知的基地。
你可以选择单人游戏，使用 JagLink 进行双人游戏，或者使用 ICD 的 CatBoxes 进行最多 8 人的多人游戏。在屏幕和雷达上，每个玩家的空中汽车都以不同颜色显示，以便区分敌我。游戏有 3 种难度设置。你将通过驾驶舱的仪表盘来操控空中汽车飞行、选择武器和查看雷达，同时在空中与敌人战斗并射击地面目标。
游戏特色包括逼真的 3D 音效、电脑语音（可按需关闭），以及在游戏开场和关卡间隙播放的音乐。

NAME: Aliens Versus Predator
DESC: Aliens versus Predator is a first-person shooter on Jaguar. It offers to play as a Marine, an Alien or a Predator, each race having its own strengths and weaknesses. The three campaigns take place on a space colony of marines beset by aliens, and on which a Predator ship has discreetly landed to try to kill the alien queen!
DESC_ZH: 《异形大战铁血战士》是一款适用于捷豹主机的第一人称射击游戏。玩家可以选择扮演陆战队士兵、异形或铁血战士，每个种族都有其自身的优势和劣势。三个战役的故事背景设定在一个被异形围困的陆战队太空殖民地，一艘铁血战士飞船悄然降落在此，试图杀死异形女王！

NAME: Atari Karts
DESC:
Atari Karts is a character-based go-kart racing game. It plays very similarly to Super Mario Kart. The emphasis in this game, like most kart games, is on making use of pick-up items found around the track to knock out your opponents.
There is only one game mode, a points based cup series.  There are four difficulty levels, each with 3 cups to race for. After completing all the cups for a difficulty level, you get to challenge a "boss" kart in a single race match.  If you beat the boss, he becomes a playable character.  The various cup races can be played in either single player or two player split screen modes.
DESC_ZH:
《雅达利卡丁车》是一款以角色为基础的卡丁车赛车游戏。它的玩法与《超级马里奥卡丁车》非常相似。和大多数卡丁车游戏一样，这款游戏的重点在于利用赛道周围捡到的道具来击败对手。
游戏只有一种模式，即基于积分的杯赛系列。有四个难度级别，每个级别有三场杯赛可供角逐。完成一个难度级别的所有杯赛后，你将在一场单人比赛中挑战一辆“BOSS”卡丁车。如果你击败了BOSS，他就会成为可玩角色。各种杯赛可以单人游玩，也可以双人分屏游玩。

NAME: Attack of the Mutant Penguins
DESC: In the distant galaxy of Bleurggh, an evil (but reasonably stupid) band of aliens picked up some of Earth's television signals. Unfortunately for them, they could only tune in a wildlife program. They figured the Earth would be a pushover to invade, so they disguised themselves as its inhabitants -- penguins! Word of the invasion has reached those champions of intergalactic do-goodery, Bernard and Rodney. Now, with their help, you must prevent the alien mutant penguins from triggering the Doomscale and destroying the Earth. Are you up to the challenge?
DESC_ZH: 在遥远的布勒格星系，一群邪恶（但相当愚蠢）的外星人接收到了一些地球的电视信号。不幸的是，他们只能收看到一个野生动物节目。他们认为入侵地球易如反掌，于是把自己伪装成地球的居民——企鹅！入侵的消息传到了星际正义斗士伯纳德和罗德尼耳中。现在，在他们的帮助下，你必须阻止外星变异企鹅触发末日天平并摧毁地球。你能迎接这个挑战吗？

NAME: Barkley Shut Up and Jam!
DESC: Barkley Shut Up and Jam! is a basketball video game featuring arcade-style gameplay similar to Midway's NBA Jam but closely following the rules seen in street basketball, players compete with either CPU-controlled opponents or against other players in matches across various cities of the United States.
DESC_ZH: 《巴克利，闭嘴去灌篮！》是一款篮球视频游戏，其游戏玩法为街机风格，与米德韦公司的《NBA灌篮高手》类似，但严格遵循街头篮球规则。玩家可以与电脑控制的对手对战，也可以与其他玩家在美国各个城市的比赛中一决高下。

NAME: Breakout 2000
DESC:
Breakout 2000 is the Jaguar update to Atari's classic arcade game, Breakout. The premise in Breakout is to bounce a ball off a paddle into a series of blocks that disappear when struck. While the original Breakout, which is included with this release, has simple rectangles that represent the ball and paddle, Breakout 2000 has flashy pre-rendered 3D graphics.
There are also a couple of gameplay enhancements over basic Breakout.  First, the game can be played with two players.  The second player has their own playfield at the top of the screen.  They also have their own set of blocks to demolish, and can send their ball to the bottom playfield for the other player to hit.  You can set either player to be computer controlled, so you can even watch the computer play against itself if you want.  The other enhancement are the various power-ups that allow you to shoot the blocks out directly, catch the ball, and so on.
DESC_ZH:
《打砖块2000》是雅达利经典街机游戏《打砖块》在美洲豹主机上的升级版。《打砖块》的游戏设定是用挡板反弹球，使其撞击一系列方块，方块被击中后会消失。本次发行版本中包含的原版《打砖块》，其球和挡板仅用简单的矩形表示，而《打砖块2000》则拥有华丽的预渲染3D图形。

与基础版《打砖块》相比，该游戏还有一些玩法上的改进。首先，游戏支持双人游玩。第二名玩家在屏幕顶部有自己的游戏区域。他们也有自己要摧毁的方块，还能将球发送到底部的游戏区域，让另一名玩家击球。你可以将任意一名玩家设置为电脑控制，所以如果你愿意，甚至可以观看电脑之间的对战。另一项改进是各种道具，它们能让你直接射碎方块、接住球等等。

NAME: Brutal Sports Football
DESC:
Similar to Speedball 2 in many ways, this is an ultra-violent sports game. Matches last 7 minutes, and the aim is to get the ball into a goal at each end, guarded by a net-minder. The ball can be thrown or kicked, and is an oval, resulting in frequent up-and-under type kicks. 
The gameplay is fast and flowing, and has one rule - if you can't get the ball, get the man, and decapitate him if possible. Bonus and non-bonus items appear on the pitch, such as bombs to throw at opponents, rabbits to speed up the current player, or tortoises to slow him down. 
Teams consist of humans and aliens, many of which have their own unique skills. There's a lot of blood and flailing limbs, giving things a gruesomely humorous edge. There are four leagues to progress through, plus a knockout cup and single matches.
DESC_ZH:
这款游戏在很多方面与《速球2》相似，是一款极度暴力的体育游戏。比赛时长7分钟，目标是将球踢进两端由守门员把守的球门。球可以投掷或踢击，呈椭圆形，因此经常会出现高低起伏的踢球方式。
游戏节奏快速流畅，只有一条规则——如果你抢不到球，就攻击对方球员，如有可能，将其斩首。球场上会出现奖励物品和非奖励物品，比如可以扔向对手的炸弹、能让当前球员加速的兔子，或者会让球员减速的乌龟。
球队由人类和外星人组成，其中许多角色都有自己独特的技能。游戏中有大量的血腥场面和四处飞舞的肢体，营造出一种令人毛骨悚然的幽默氛围。游戏有四个联赛可供玩家逐步挑战，此外还有淘汰赛杯赛和单场比赛。

NAME: Bubsy in Fractured Furry Tales
DESC: Only Bubsy can protect the world's kids from these silly stories and tangled-up tales as he leaps and bounds his way through 15 frantic chapters of fabulous furry fun. In Fairytaleland, Bubsy attends a twisted tea party, climbs a giant beanstalk, voyages under the sea (without getting his paws wet), head to Ali Baba's desert and even meets Hansel and Gretel, who should be up on kidnapping charges.
DESC_ZH: 只有布西能保护世界上的孩子们，让他们免受这些荒诞故事和混乱传说的侵扰。他将在15个紧张刺激的章节中尽情跳跃，体验一场精彩绝伦的毛球冒险之旅。在童话世界里，布西会参加一场怪异的茶会，攀爬巨大的豆茎，在海底航行（还不会弄湿他的爪子），前往阿里巴巴所在的沙漠，甚至会遇到汉塞尔和格莱特，这两人可是应该被控绑架罪呢。

NAME: Super Burnout
DESC: Super Burnout is an arcade-style superbike racing game inspired by Super Hang-On. Players control an ultra-fast motorcycle through races that take place on famous tracks throughout the world. There are six bikes to choose from with races on a total of eight different tracks. The usual racing game modes are present. There is a single race mode, a practice mode, and a championship mode. Players can also compete against a friend in a single-race versus mode.
DESC_ZH: 《超级狂飙》是一款受《超级摩托》启发的街机风格超级摩托车赛车游戏。玩家操控一辆超快的摩托车，在世界各地著名的赛道上进行比赛。游戏中有六辆摩托车可供选择，比赛将在总共八条不同的赛道上进行。游戏具备常见的赛车游戏模式，有单场比赛模式、练习模式和锦标赛模式。玩家还能在单场对战模式中与朋友一决高下。

NAME: Cannon Fodder
DESC:
Guide a team of up to four soldiers through 72 levels of combat in this innovative top-down action/strategy hybrid, best thought of as Lemmings crossed with Commando crossed with Dune 2. The characters are controlled indirectly using the mouse, as you activate each soldier or group of them by highlighting them, click the left button to move them to a particular spot, and the right button for them to fire guns at an enemy. You can also pick up grenades, which can be used to destroy groups of enemies or buildings (by pressing both buttons at once). 
Each mission has a specific objective, and some feature vehicles such as tanks to make things easier. Your troops can cross water but can't shoot within it, so finding and controlling bridges is often crucial. You can use the arrangement of trees to find hiding places to shoot from, and should watch out for CPU soldiers also doing so.
DESC_ZH:
在这款创新的俯视角动作/策略混合游戏中，带领最多四名士兵组成的小队，历经72个战斗关卡。这款游戏可以被看作是《旅鼠奇趣冒险》《突击队员》和《沙丘2》的结合体。游戏通过鼠标间接控制角色，你可以通过高亮显示来激活每个士兵或士兵小组，点击左键将他们移动到特定位置，点击右键让他们向敌人开枪。你还可以捡起手榴弹，通过同时按下两个按钮，用手榴弹摧毁成群的敌人或建筑物。
每个任务都有特定的目标，有些任务还会提供坦克等载具，让任务变得更轻松。你的部队可以涉水，但在水中无法射击，因此找到并控制桥梁往往至关重要。你可以利用树木的分布寻找射击掩体，同时也要留意电脑控制的士兵也会这么做。

NAME: Checkered Flag
DESC: Checkered Flag for the Jaguar is a 3D F1-style racing game. The racing game staples are here: single race, practice, and tournament. You can choose to set up a variety of options for each race, also.  You can choose various weather conditions.  Or, you can set up your car to change it's handling characteristics.  There are 10 different tracks on which to race, each with a different theme.  Some take place on sunny beaches, others take place in the arctic.
DESC_ZH: 适用于美洲豹主机的《方格旗》是一款 3D 一级方程式风格的赛车游戏。这款赛车游戏具备常见元素：单场比赛、练习赛和锦标赛。你还可以为每场比赛设置多种选项。你可以选择不同的天气条件。或者，你可以对赛车进行设置以改变其操控特性。游戏中有 10 条不同主题的赛道可供比赛。有些赛道位于阳光明媚的海滩，有些则在北极地区。

NAME: Club Drive
DESC:
It is the future, and the most popular theme park around is Club Drive.  Scientists have managed to invent indestructible cars. Patrons to Club Drive can drive these cars around imaginative environments and play outrageous driving games.
Club Drive as a Jaguar game is a simple driving simulator.  You are put in the drivers seat, and can race through some large environments.  The racing areas available are: an old west ghost town, San Francisco, a giant house, and a simple hot-wheels style track.  In addition to the racing modes, there are object collection and 2-player tag modes.  These modes are played out in smaller versions of the areas described above.
DESC_ZH:
在未来世界，最受欢迎的主题公园当属“俱乐部飙车”。科学家成功发明了坚不可摧的汽车。“俱乐部飙车”的游客可以驾驶这些汽车在充满想象力的环境中穿梭，还能玩刺激的驾驶游戏。
作为一款美洲豹游戏公司出品的游戏，“俱乐部飙车”是一款简单的驾驶模拟器。你将坐在驾驶座上，在一些广阔的环境中驰骋。可供选择的赛车区域包括：一座旧西部鬼城、旧金山、一座巨型房屋，以及一条简单的风火轮风格赛道。除了赛车模式，还有物品收集模式和双人追逐模式。这些模式会在上述区域的缩小版场景中进行。

NAME: Cybermorph
DESC:
Cybermorph was the first game released for Atari's Jaguar console. It's a 3d sci-fi shoot-'em-up.  The story goes like this:  The evil Pernitia Empire is swallowing up the galaxy's planets left and right.  What's worse, the resistance forces have had their secret weapons stolen from them and put into pods spread out on many different planets.  You must pilot the T-Griffon morphing attack craft to each planet and recover the pods to stop the Pernitians.
So, in each planet, or level, you must collect a certain number of pods and make it to the exit before the enemies shoot you down. Fortunately, there are power-ups that can strategically enhance the T-Griffon's offensive capabilities.  After clearing 8 planets, you take on a boss creature/ship before moving on to the next sector.  There are 4 levels like this to clear, each with progressively increasing difficulty.
DESC_ZH:
《赛博变形》是为雅达利捷豹游戏机发布的首款游戏。这是一款3D科幻射击游戏。故事是这样的：邪恶的佩尔尼亚帝国正在大肆吞并银河系的行星。更糟糕的是，抵抗军的秘密武器被偷走，并被放置在散布于多个不同行星的舱体中。你必须驾驶T-狮鹫变形攻击飞船前往各个行星，回收舱体，以阻止佩尔尼亚人。

所以，在每个行星（即每个关卡）中，你必须收集一定数量的舱体，并在敌人将你击落之前抵达出口。幸运的是，游戏中有一些道具可以有策略地增强T-狮鹫的攻击能力。在通关8个行星后，你要挑战一个首领级生物/飞船，然后才能进入下一个区域。像这样的关卡共有4个，难度会逐渐增加。

NAME: Defender 2000
DESC:
Defender 2000 is an update of the classic arcade game by Eugene Jarvis.  This Jaguar game features a port of the original game, and two updated versions: Defender Plus and Defender 2000.
Defender combines a side scrolling shooter with a search and rescue game. You control a ship that travels left and right above the planets surface. Alien lander craft warp into the play area, and begin to descend to the surface. Along the surface, there are humanoids ripe for the picking.  The alien landers grab the humanoids and begin to carry them up the screen. You have to shoot the landers before they reach the top of the screen, and catch the humanoids before they fall to the surface.
The Defender Plus update features gameplay that is very similar to the original, and graphics that have a crazy, psychedelic look. The Defender 2000 update adds playfields that scroll in both directions, weapon power-ups, bonus rounds, improved graphics, and extremely high speed gameplay.
DESC_ZH:
《捍卫者2000》是尤金·贾维斯经典街机游戏的升级版。这款美洲豹主机游戏包含原版游戏的移植版本，以及两个升级版：《捍卫者加强版》和《捍卫者2000》。
《捍卫者》将横向卷轴射击游戏与搜索救援游戏相结合。你操控一艘飞船，在行星表面上方左右飞行。外星登陆船会瞬移到游戏区域，并开始降落到行星表面。行星表面有许多可供抓捕的类人生物。外星登陆船会抓走类人生物，并将它们带上屏幕上方。你必须在登陆船到达屏幕顶部之前将其击落，并在类人生物坠落到行星表面之前接住它们。
《捍卫者加强版》的游戏玩法与原版非常相似，画面则呈现出疯狂、迷幻的风格。《捍卫者2000》升级版增加了双向滚动的游戏场景、武器强化道具、奖励关卡、改进的画面，以及极快节奏的游戏体验。

NAME: Doom
DESC:
The Union Aerospace Corporation has been experimenting with teleportation technology on Mars' moons Phobos and Deimos. After early successes, something goes wrong. It seems the scientists have opened a gateway straight to Hell. Phobos base is overrun with demonic creatures, and the whole of Deimos simply vanishes. A squad of marines is sent to Phobos, but all except one are quickly slaughtered. It falls to the surviving marine to grab some guns and strike back at the demons.
id Software's follow-up to their genre-defining Wolfenstein 3D, DOOM is another first person shooter: full-on action seen from the space marine's perspective. Like Wolfenstein, the game consists of distinct episodes, playable in any order. The first episode, Knee-Deep in the Dead, takes place in the Phobos base and is freely available as shareware. The full game continues on Deimos in The Shores of Hell and culminates in Inferno, the final episode which takes place in Hell itself. Each episode consists of nine levels, one of which is a hidden level.
The basic objective in each level is simply to reach the exit. Since dozens of enemies stand in the way, the only way to get there is through killing them. Switches and buttons must be 
pressed to advance at certain points and often color-coded locked doors will block the way - matching keycards or skull keys must be found to pass.
DOOM's engine technology is more advanced than Wolfenstein's, and thus the levels are more varied and complex. The engine simulates different heights (stairs and lifts appear frequently) and different lighting conditions (some rooms are pitch black, others only barely illuminated). There are outdoor areas, pools of radioactive waste that hurt the player, ceilings that come down and crush him, and unlike Wolfenstein's orthogonally aligned corridors, the walls in DOOM can be in any angle to each other. An automap helps in navigating the levels.
Stylistically, the levels begin with a futuristic theme in the military base on Phobos and gradually change to a hellish environment, complete with satanic symbols (pentagrams, upside-down-crosses and portraits of horned demons), hung-up mutilated corpses and the distorted faces of the damned.
DOOM features a large weapon arsenal, with most weapons having both advantages and drawbacks. The starting weapons are the fists and a simple pistol. Also available are a shotgun (high damage, slow reload, not good at distances), a chaingun (high firing rate, but slightly inaccurate in longer bursts) and a plasma rifle (combining a high firing rate and large damage). The rocket launcher also deals out lots of damage, but the explosion causes blast damage and must be used with care in confined areas or it might prove deadly to the player as well as the enemies. Two further (in)famous weapons in DOOM are the chainsaw for close-quarter carnage, and the BFG9000 energy gun, that, while taking some practice to fire correctly, can destroy most enemies in a single burst. The different weapons use four different ammunition types (bullets, shells, rockets and energy cells), so collecting the right type for a certain gun is important.
DOOM drops some of Wolfenstein's arcade-inspired aspects, so there are no extra lives or treasures to be collected for points, but many other powerups are still available. Medpacks heal damage while armor protects from receiving it in the first place. Backpacks allow more ammunition to be carried, a computer map reveals the whole layout of the level on the automap (including any secret areas), light amplification visors illuminate dark areas and radiation suits allow travel over waste without taking damage. Also available are berserk packs (which radically increase the damage inflicted by the fists) as well as short-time invisibility and invulnerability powerups.
The enemies to be destroyed include former humans corrupted during the invasion, plus demons in all shapes and sizes: fireball-throwing imps, floating skulls, pink-skinned demons with powerful bite attacks and large one-eyed flying monstrosities called Cacodemons. Each episode ends with a boss battle against one or two especially powerful creatures.
DOOM popularized multiplayer in the genre with two different modes: Cooperative allows up to four players to move through the single-player game together, while Deathmatch is a competitive game type where players blast at each other to collect 'frag' points for a kill and re-spawn in 
a random location after being killed.
DESC_ZH:
联合航天公司一直在火星的卫星火卫一和火卫二上进行传送技术实验。早期实验取得成功后，意外发生了。似乎科学家们打开了一条直通地狱的通道。火卫一基地被恶魔生物占领，而整个火卫二则直接消失了。一队海军陆战队士兵被派往火卫一，但除一人外，其余人很快都被屠杀殆尽。幸存的陆战队员只能拿起武器，向恶魔们展开反击。
id Software在其定义了游戏类型的《德军总部3D》之后推出的《毁灭战士》，是又一款第一人称射击游戏：以太空陆战队队员的视角呈现的激烈动作游戏。和《德军总部》一样，这款游戏由多个独立的章节组成，玩家可以按任意顺序游玩。第一章“深陷尸潮”发生在火卫一基地，并且作为共享软件可以免费获取。完整游戏在“地狱之岸”章节继续在火卫二展开，并在最终章“炼狱”达到高潮，该章节的故事直接发生在地狱本身。每个章节包含九个关卡，其中一个是隐藏关卡。
每个关卡的基本目标很简单，就是到达出口。由于有数十个敌人挡路，唯一的办法就是消灭它们。在某些地方，必须按下开关和按钮才能继续前进，而且常有颜色编码的锁门挡住去路——必须找到匹配的钥匙卡或骷髅钥匙才能通过。
《毁灭战士》的引擎技术比《德军总部》更先进，因此关卡更加多样和复杂。引擎模拟了不同的高度（楼梯和电梯经常出现）和不同的光照条件（有些房间漆黑一片，有些则只有微弱的光线）。有户外区域、会伤害玩家的放射性废料池、会降下并压碎玩家的天花板，而且与《德军总部》正交排列的走廊不同，《毁灭战士》中的墙壁可以呈任意角度。自动地图有助于玩家在关卡中导航。
从风格上来说，关卡从火卫一军事基地的未来主义主题开始，逐渐转变为地狱般的环境，到处都是撒旦符号（五芒星、倒十字架和长角恶魔的画像）、悬挂着的残缺尸体以及被诅咒者扭曲的面孔。
《毁灭战士》拥有丰富的武器库，大多数武器都有优缺点。初始武器是拳头和一把简单的手枪。此外还有霰弹枪（高伤害，装填慢，远距离效果不佳）、机枪（高射速，但长时间连射时略有偏差）和等离子步枪（结合了高射速和高伤害）。火箭发射器也能造成大量伤害，但爆炸会产生冲击波伤害，在狭窄区域使用时必须小心，否则可能对玩家和敌人都造成致命伤害。《毁灭战士》中另外两件（臭）名昭著的武器是用于近距离屠杀的电锯和BFG9000能量枪，后者虽然需要一些练习才能正确使用，但一次射击就能摧毁大多数敌人。不同的武器使用四种不同类型的弹药（子弹、霰弹、火箭和能量电池），因此为特定的枪支收集正确类型的弹药很重要。
《毁灭战士》摒弃了《德军总部》中一些受街机风格启发的元素，因此没有额外生命或可收集以获取分数的宝藏，但仍然有许多其他增强道具。医疗包可以治疗伤害，而护甲可以从一开始就防止受到伤害。背包可以携带更多弹药，电脑地图可以在自动地图上显示整个关卡的布局（包括任何秘密区域），微光夜视镜可以照亮黑暗区域，防辐射服可以让玩家在废料上行走而不受伤害。此外还有狂暴包（能大幅增加拳头造成的伤害）以及短时间的隐形和无敌增强道具。
需要消灭的敌人包括在入侵中被腐化的前人类，以及各种形状和大小的恶魔：会投掷火球的小鬼、漂浮的骷髅、具有强大咬击攻击的粉色皮肤恶魔，以及被称为“痛苦魔王”的巨大独眼飞行怪物。每个章节都以与一两个特别强大的生物进行的BOSS战结束。
《毁灭战士》通过两种不同的模式使多人游戏在该类型中流行起来：合作模式允许最多四名玩家一起通关单人游戏，而死亡竞赛是一种竞技游戏类型，玩家互相射击，击杀对手可获得“击杀”分数，死亡后会在随机位置重生。

FILE: Double Dragon V - The Shadow Falls (World).zip
NAME: Double Dragon V : The Shadow Falls
DESC: Double Dragon V: The Shadow Falls is a sequel to Double Dragon series. Unlike the previous games, which were side-scrolling fighting action games or beat-em-ups, Shadow Falls is a head-to-head fighting game based on the animated Double Dragon TV series in the style of Capcom's 1991 arcade-hit Street Fighter II.
DESC_ZH: 《双截龙V：暗影降临》是《双截龙》系列的续作。与之前的游戏不同，前作是横版格斗动作游戏或清版过关游戏，而《暗影降临》是一款基于《双截龙》动画电视剧的一对一格斗游戏，风格类似卡普空1991年的街机热门游戏《街头霸王II》。

NAME: Dragon : The Bruce Lee Story
DESC: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story is a fighting video game based on the film Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story, which is a semi-fictionalized account of the life of Bruce Lee. You control Lee, and must defeat enemies to progress through the game, recalling major action scenes from the film. You can use a variety of martial arts moves to defeat their enemies and build up a chi meter, which can help unleash special moves on their opponents. The game supports up to three players simultaneously, playing through the game co-operatively, or against each other in a battle mode.
DESC_ZH: 《龙：李小龙的故事》是一款基于同名电影《龙：李小龙的故事》改编的格斗类电子游戏，该电影是对李小龙生平的半虚构化记述。你将操控李小龙，必须击败敌人才能推进游戏进程，重温电影中的主要动作场景。你可以使用各种武术招式来击败敌人，并积攒气槽，这有助于对对手施展特殊招式。该游戏最多支持三名玩家同时游玩，既可以合作通关，也能在对战模式中相互对抗。

NAME: Evolution : Dino Dudes
DESC: The gameplay of The Humans has similarities to Lode Runner and Lemmings. Your job in this action puzzler is to help prehistoric man to evolve by helping them discover tools, the wheel, weapons, or even fire. Each level in the game will have a given task to help in this, and you are allotted a number of characters who must accomplish the task. The player can switch from person to person while moving the characters around each scrolling puzzle, and teamwork is essential to success.
DESC_ZH: 《人类》的玩法与《淘金者》和《旅鼠》有相似之处。在这款动作解谜游戏中，你的任务是帮助史前人类进化，引导他们发现工具、轮子、武器，甚至是火。游戏中的每个关卡都会有特定的任务来助力这一进化过程，同时会分配给你一定数量的角色，他们必须完成这些任务。玩家在操控角色在每个滚动的谜题场景中移动时，可以在不同角色之间切换，而团队协作对于成功至关重要。

NAME: Fever Pitch Soccer
DESC:
In this isometric football game, 50 national teams are represented to play in two game modes: Exhibition and Tournament (a series of seven games on four continents, with a final against the World All-Stars), with the ability to set time, difficulty level, see cutscenes after goals and if players are free to kick each other around without (many) fouls.
While the game seems short-featured for 1995 standards, the tournament mode includes a twist: depending on how well the player defeats his opponents, he can trade his "standard players", who won't do anything spectacular (but at least fill up the ranks) for star players, who not only look different, are able to cross and backheel the ball but also have a unique ability at the disposal of the player.
DESC_ZH:
在这款等轴测视角足球游戏中，有50支国家队参与两种游戏模式：表演赛和锦标赛（在四大洲进行七场系列赛，最后与世界全明星队对决），玩家可以设置比赛时间、难度等级，进球后观看过场动画，还能决定球员是否可以在犯规较少的情况下相互拼抢。
虽然按照1995年的标准来看，这款游戏的功能似乎较少，但锦标赛模式有一个亮点：根据玩家击败对手的表现，玩家可以用“普通球员”（他们不会有什么惊人表现，但至少能填补阵容）交换明星球员，明星球员不仅外观不同，能够传球和用脚后跟踢球，还拥有一项可供玩家使用的独特能力。

NAME: Fight for Life
DESC:
Fight for Life is a 3D fighting game that takes place in hell.  The player controls one of eight deceased fighters competing to earn a chance to escape and return to the world of the living. After they defeat an opponent they not only move on to the next round, but also learn two of the opponent's moves.
This is the only 3D fighting game released for the Jaguar.  It features brightly-colored texture mapped fighters and arenas. Gameplay is very similar to Virtua Fighter, in that the moves more-or-less look like real martial arts.
DESC_ZH:
《为生存而战》是一款发生在地狱的3D格斗游戏。玩家可以操控八名已故格斗者之一，为获得逃离地狱、重返人间的机会而展开竞争。击败对手后，玩家不仅能晋级下一轮，还能学会对手的两个招式。
这是为美洲豹主机发行的唯一一款3D格斗游戏。游戏中的格斗者和竞技场采用了色彩鲜艳的纹理映射。游戏玩法与《VR战士》非常相似，招式或多或少看起来都像是真正的武术。

NAME: Flashback : The Quest for Identity
DESC:
You're Conrad B. Hart, Galaxis Bureau of Investigation Agent and right now you're stranded on a far-away planet after discovering an alien plot to overtake Earth. You must travel and find your way through four planets back to Earth and foil the aliens' sinister and deadly plans. 
 
The award winning sci-fi action adventure comes to Jaguar. And it's gonna rip you right out of your comfortable little century and hurl you smack into a time and place that'll have you begging for a nap! 
 
-Film-style, fluid 24 frames-per-second animation and gives life-like movements to this wild action game. 
 
-You star as super-agent Conrad Hart, stranded on a far-away planet after you discover an alien plot to overtake Earth.
DESC_ZH:
你是康拉德·B·哈特，银河调查局特工。此刻，在发现外星人企图占领地球的阴谋后，你被困在了一颗遥远的星球上。你必须穿越并设法从四颗星球返回地球，挫败外星人邪恶而致命的计划。

这款屡获殊荣的科幻动作冒险游戏登陆美洲豹主机。它会将你从舒适的小世界中一把揪出，把你狠狠抛进一个让你只想打个盹的时空！

- 电影风格、流畅的每秒24帧动画，为这款狂野的动作游戏赋予逼真的动作效果。

- 你将扮演超级特工康拉德·哈特，在发现外星人企图占领地球的阴谋后，被困在了一颗遥远的星球上。

NAME: Flip Out!
DESC:
FlipOut! is a puzzle game starring aliens from the planet Phrohmaj. Your  objective in each puzzle is simple: you must place all the colored tiles into the correct spaces on the board. The tricky part is that there is always one more tile than there are spaces. That means you are always juggling at least one tile in the air. The game becomes more difficult as you have to juggle more tiles, and the Phrohmajians try to interfere.
This game features nine bizarre areas, each with multiple puzzles.  The graphics feature a lot of crazy animation of the Phrohmaj onlookers and lots of bright and colorful tiles.
DESC_ZH:
《疯狂翻转！》是一款以弗罗玛吉星球外星人为主角的益智游戏。每一关谜题的目标很简单：你必须将所有彩色方块放置到棋盘上的正确位置。难点在于方块的数量总是比位置多一个。这意味着你至少得让一个方块在空中‘腾挪’。随着需要‘腾挪’的方块增多，而且弗罗玛吉星人还会从中捣乱，游戏难度也会随之增加。
这款游戏设有九个奇异区域，每个区域都有多道谜题。游戏画面中有大量弗罗玛吉星人旁观者的搞怪动画，还有许多色彩鲜艳的方块。

NAME: Hover Strike
DESC:
Terrakian Pirates have taken over a colonized planet under Federation control.  They've set up an atmospheric cannon, making invasion impossible.  Your job, as a hovercraft pilot, is to launch a pre-emptive strike on the planet's surface.
Hover Strike for the Jaguar is a mission-based tank game.  In each mission, you will drop to the surface of the planet, destroy some targets, and then return to your ship in orbit.  The hovercraft you pilot is heavily armored and includes various weapons systems to take out enemies and targets.
DESC_ZH:
特拉基安海盗占领了联邦控制下的一个殖民星球。他们架起了一门大气炮，使得入侵变得不可能。作为一名气垫船飞行员，你的任务是对行星表面发动先发制人的打击。
《气垫突击》是一款为美洲豹主机设计的基于任务的坦克游戏。在每个任务中，你将降落到行星表面，摧毁一些目标，然后返回轨道上的飞船。你驾驶的气垫船装备了厚重的装甲，并配备了各种武器系统，用于消灭敌人和目标。

NAME: Sensible Soccer : International Edition
DESC: Released alongside the 1994 World Cup, this was the first version of Sensible Soccer to feature teams from outside Europe. The World Cup tournament is featured in full, and you can adjust which 24 teams this features, a particularly crucial feature for English and French fans, as their nations failed to qualify. For the first time in the series an on-screen referee is featured. The club team data has been updated to take into account transfers and kit changes since the previous version. Gameplay is much the same as previous editions, being viewed from above with small sprites and loose ball control.
DESC_ZH: 这款游戏与1994年世界杯同期发布，是《梦幻足球》首个包含欧洲以外球队的版本。游戏完整呈现了世界杯赛事，你可以调整参赛的24支球队，这对英格兰和法国球迷来说尤为重要，因为他们的国家队未能获得参赛资格。该系列首次在屏幕上加入了裁判元素。俱乐部球队的数据也进行了更新，考虑到了自上一版本以来的球员转会和队服变更情况。游戏玩法与之前的版本大致相同，采用俯瞰视角，球员形象小巧，控球感较为松散。

NAME: Iron Soldier
DESC:
It is the future, and the earth has been covered with wastelands and cities.  The powerful, faceless Iron First Corporation has replaced the last forms of free government.  Now, they are developing a new, 42-foot, armed robot known as the Iron Soldier.  With the Iron Soldier, no one will be able to stop the Iron First Corporation.  The only hope is the Resistance, a group that has managed to capture one of the Iron Soldier prototypes.  You are a pilot for the Resistance.  It's up to you to pilot the robot and bring down the Iron Fist.
Iron Soldier is mech sim played from an in-cockpit view.  There are 16 single player missions.  Objectives involve taking out certain targets, defending convoys, collecting items, and so on.
DESC_ZH:
在未来，地球被荒地和城市所覆盖。强大且神秘的钢铁先锋公司取代了最后一批自由政府。如今，他们正在研发一种名为“钢铁战士”的新型42英尺武装机器人。有了钢铁战士，无人能阻挡钢铁先锋公司。唯一的希望是抵抗组织，他们成功缴获了一台钢铁战士原型机。你是抵抗组织的一名驾驶员。驾驶这台机器人并打倒钢铁铁拳就靠你了。
《钢铁战士》是一款从驾驶舱视角进行的机甲模拟游戏。有16个单人任务。任务目标包括消灭特定目标、护送车队、收集物品等等。

NAME: I-War
DESC:
The giant supercomputer that controls the world's information has been infected with viruses. You must enter the virtual world known as the I-Way, and clear them out with your anti-virus tank. 
I-War is a 3D virtual reality tank game. In each of the 21 levels, you must find all the data pods and make your way to the exit. Enemy tanks, turrets, and bombers stand in your way, as well as occasional traps or locked doors controlled by hidden switches. Levels are divided into simple, enclosed rooms, linearly connected by one-way teleporters. 
You can select a fast, medium, or heavy tank at the beginning of the game, with its abilities reflected in the strength of its guns or the amount of punishment it can absorb. Throughout the game, you will also find weapon power-ups and tank upgrades (such as shields, radar, and auto-targeting) to help you stay effective against the increasing numbers of enemy defenders. You can save your progress to the cart at the end of each level.
DESC_ZH:
控制全球信息的巨型超级计算机感染了病毒。你必须进入名为“信息高速公路”的虚拟世界，用你的杀毒坦克将病毒清除。
《网络战争》是一款3D虚拟现实坦克游戏。在21个关卡中，你必须找到所有的数据舱并前往出口。敌方坦克、炮塔和轰炸机，以及偶尔出现的陷阱或由隐藏开关控制的锁门都会阻挡你的去路。关卡被分割成简单的封闭房间，通过单向传送器线性连接。
游戏开始时，你可以选择轻型、中型或重型坦克，其能力体现在火炮威力或承受伤害的能力上。在游戏过程中，你还会找到武器强化道具和坦克升级部件（如护盾、雷达和自动瞄准系统），以帮助你在面对越来越多的敌方防御力量时保持战斗力。每关结束时，你可以将游戏进度保存到游戏卡带中。

NAME: Jack Nicklaus Cyber Golf
NAME_ZH: 杰克·尼克劳斯虚拟高尔夫
DESC: A prototype of the unreleased Jack Nicklaus Cyber Golf for the Atari Jaguar.
DESC_ZH: 这是一款未发行的雅达利捷豹主机游戏《杰克·尼克劳斯虚拟高尔夫》的原型。

NAME: Jaguar Hockey Legends 2013 (World) (Unl)
NAME_ZH: 美洲虎冰球传奇2013（全球版）（非授权）

NAME: Kasumi Ninja
DESC:
On the tiny island of Kasumi, there exists a portal between this world and the Netherworld.  For many centuries, this portal has been kept closed by the balance between good and evil forces.  Now, the dark ninja lord Gyaku has defeated the forces of good, and opened the portal to the netherworld.  It is up to you, a Kasumi ninja, to stop Gyaku and restore balance to the world.
Kasumi Ninja is a one-on-one fighting game featuring digitized character graphics.  There are 8 fighters for you to choose from, each with their own fighting environments.
DESC_ZH:
在霞之小岛上，存在着一个连接此界与冥界的传送门。 几个世纪以来，这扇传送门一直因善恶力量的平衡而保持关闭。 如今，黑暗忍者领主逆魔击败了正义力量，打开了通往冥界的传送门。 现在，身为霞之忍者的你，要肩负起阻止逆魔、恢复世界平衡的重任。
霞之忍者是一款采用数字化角色图形的一对一格斗游戏。 你可以从8名格斗家中选择，每位格斗家都有自己的战斗场景。

NAME: Missile Command 3D
DESC:
Missile Command 3D is an update to the classic Atari arcade game. The goal in Missile Command is to defend your cities against an onslaught of missiles coming from the sky. Your arsenal consists of three anti-missile flak cannons. You have to position the anti-missile clouds in the path of the incoming missiles to stop them from impacting.
This Jaguar game has 3 modes. First, there is a port of the original arcade game. There are neat extras for this mode like graphic backdrops and the ability to resize or scale the screen. The second mode is Missile Command 3D. This mode retains the gameplay of the original, but adds 3D graphics to the mix. The final mode, Virtual Missile Command, changes things up quite a lot. Instead of anti-missile flak, your cannons shoot lasers. This means you don't need to lead your targets anymore. You play the game from a first-person perspective, and must switch between the three cannons via buttons on the keypad. There are nine levels in this mode, each with a boss at the end.
DESC_ZH:
《3D导弹防御》是经典雅达利街机游戏的升级版。《导弹防御》的目标是抵御从天空袭来的大量导弹，保护你的城市。你的武器库中有三门防空炮。你必须在来袭导弹的路径上布置防空云，阻止它们命中目标。
这款美洲豹主机游戏有三种模式。第一种是原版街机游戏的移植版。该模式有一些不错的额外功能，比如图形背景以及调整屏幕大小或缩放的功能。第二种模式是《3D导弹防御》。此模式保留了原版的玩法，但加入了3D图形元素。最后一种模式是《虚拟导弹防御》，它对玩法进行了较大改动。你的防空炮不再发射防空炮弹，而是发射激光。这意味着你不再需要提前预判目标位置。你将以第一人称视角进行游戏，并通过键盘上的按钮在三门防空炮之间切换。该模式共有九个关卡，每个关卡的最后都有一个首领关卡。

NAME: NBA Jam Tournament Edition
DESC: NBA Jam, which featured 2-on-2 basketball, is one of the first real playable basketball games, and is also one of the first sports games to feature NBA-licensed teams and players, and their real digitized likenesses. NBA Jam: T.E. included updated rosters, new features and easter eggs combined with the same gameplay of the original. Teams now consisted of three players (though only two could be on court at any time), with the exception of the new "Rookies" team, which consists of five players, all picked in the 1994 NBA draft, and players could be substituted into the game between quarters.
DESC_ZH: 《NBA劲爆篮球》以2对2篮球为特色，是最早的真正可玩的篮球游戏之一，也是最早采用获得NBA授权的球队和球员以及他们真实数字化形象的体育游戏之一。《NBA劲爆篮球：锦标赛版》包含了更新后的球员名单、新特性和隐藏要素，同时保留了原版的游戏玩法。现在每支球队由三名球员组成（不过任何时候场上只能有两名球员），新加入的“新秀”队除外，该队有五名球员，他们都是1994年NBA选秀大会的新秀，并且球员可以在每节比赛之间进行替换。

NAME: Painter (World) (1995-12-29) (Unl)
NAME_ZH: 画家（全球版）（1995年12月29日）（未授权）

NAME: Pinball Fantasies
DESC: After the success of Pinball Dreams on several systems, a sequel featuring four new tables was created. The gameplay is much the same as the first game, with realistic physics, multi-player options and a high score table to aim for. The tables are Partyland, Speed Devils, Billion Dollar Gameshow and Stones 'n' Bones, taking in a funfair, racing cars, a tacky game-show, and a graveyard. Each one has a range of ramps, combos, light sequences and targets to shoot, as well as general themes which are less influenced by real tables than those in Pinball Dreams.
DESC_ZH: 在《梦幻弹珠台》在多个系统上取得成功后，制作了一款包含四张新球桌的续作。游戏玩法与第一部大致相同，拥有逼真的物理效果、多人游戏选项和可供挑战的高分榜。球桌分别是“派对乐园”“速度恶魔”“亿元游戏秀”和“石与骨”，场景涵盖了游乐场、赛车、俗气的游戏节目和墓地。每张球桌都有一系列坡道、连击、灯光序列和可射击的目标，而且与《梦幻弹珠台》相比，其整体主题受真实弹珠台的影响较小。

NAME: Pitfall : The Mayan Adventure
DESC: Pitfall: The Mayan Adventure is a sequel to Activision's 1982 Pitfall! for the Atari 2600, the player controls Pitfall Harry, Jr., son of the protagonist of the original game, as he attempts to rescue his father from a Mayan jungle setting.
DESC_ZH: 《陷阱：玛雅冒险》是动视于1982年为雅达利2600主机推出的《陷阱！》的续作。玩家将操控小陷阱哈利，也就是原版游戏主角的儿子，在玛雅丛林场景中设法营救他的父亲。

NAME: Plucky Duck in Hollywood Hijinks
NAME_ZH: 好莱坞闹剧之勇敢小鸭
DESC: A prototype of the unreleased Plucky Duck in Hollywood Hijinks for the Atari Jaguar.
DESC_ZH: 这是一款未发行的雅达利捷豹游戏《好莱坞闹剧之勇敢小鸭》的原型。

NAME: Power Drive Rally
DESC:
Power Drive Rally is a view into the exciting world of rally racing.  This game is an overhead-view racer featuring real cars and tracks based on locations around the world.
The main game mode portrays a season of championship racing.  There are several types of races that you will encounter.  First, there is the special stage, which is a timed qualifying round.  Second, there is the rally cross stage, in which you race against one other computer-controlled racer.  Finally, there is the skill stage, where you have to perform a series of tricky driving maneuvers.  After each round, you earn money for qualifying or winning.  You can then use this money to repair your car, or save the money to purchase a new, faster car.
DESC_ZH:
《动力驱动拉力赛》带你领略激动人心的拉力赛车世界。这款游戏是一款俯瞰视角的赛车游戏，以世界各地的真实汽车和赛道为特色。

主要游戏模式呈现了一个赛季的锦标赛赛事。你将遇到几种不同类型的比赛。首先是特殊赛段，这是一个计时资格赛。其次是拉力越野赛段，在这个赛段中你要与另一名电脑控制的车手竞争。最后是技巧赛段，在这个赛段中你必须完成一系列棘手的驾驶操作。每一轮比赛结束后，你会因获得资格或获胜而赚取金钱。然后你可以用这些钱来修理你的汽车，或者把钱存起来购买一辆更快的新车。

NAME: Raiden
DESC:
In the year 2090, Earth is invaded by extra-terrestrials. The World Alliance of Nations has developed a supersonic attack fighter, Raiden, to defend the Earth. A pilot must take control of the experimental fighter to destroy the alien warships that just happen to look like odd variations of typical military tanks and planes with gadgets attached to them. 
Raiden (called Raiden Trad on the Genesis and SNES) is an over-head vertical-scrolling shooter, based on an arcade game of the same title. It features two forms of weapon upgrades and two types of missiles (normal or homing). You start the game with several bombs which you can use to destroy most enemies on the screen to get yourself out of a jam. Each level ends with a large boss or bosses.
DESC_ZH:
2090年，地球遭到外星人入侵。世界国家联盟研制出了一款超音速攻击战斗机——“雷电”，用于保卫地球。一名飞行员必须操控这架实验性战斗机，摧毁那些外形酷似普通军事坦克和飞机的变种、还带有各种装置的外星战舰。
“雷电”（在世嘉Genesis和任天堂超级任天堂娱乐系统上被称为“雷电传统版”）是一款基于同名街机游戏的俯视角纵向卷轴射击游戏。它有两种武器升级形式和两种导弹（普通导弹或寻的导弹）。游戏开始时你会拥有几颗炸弹，你可以用它们摧毁屏幕上的大多数敌人，让自己摆脱困境。每一关的结尾都会有一个或多个大型首领敌人。

NAME: Rayman
DESC:
When a villain known only as Mr. Dark appears, trouble brews in Rayman's world.  Mr. Dark captures the Toons - source of light and Rayman's friends.  With no more light, evil creatures begin to roam, making the world unsafe for everyone.  Its up to you, as Rayman, to free your friends and put an end to Mr. Dark's dastardly schemes!
Rayman is side-scrolling platformer starring the titular Rayman, a big-nosed chap with no arms or legs.  Rayman can jump and use his hair to hover for a short period of time.  He can also attack by throwing his fists, or winding up his fists for a more powerful punch.  He can occasionally find special power ups that grant him unlimited flying power, giving him the ability to navigate through tricky mazes.
Aside from the platforming action, the other notable feature of Rayman is its large, detailed and vibrant graphics, which have helped it to stand out from most other similar games in the genre.
DESC_ZH:
当一个只被称为黑暗先生的反派出现时，雷曼的世界陷入了麻烦。黑暗先生抓走了图恩族——光明之源，也是雷曼的朋友们。没有了光明，邪恶生物开始四处游荡，让整个世界变得危机四伏。现在，你要扮演雷曼，解救你的朋友们，终结黑暗先生的邪恶阴谋！
雷曼是一款横版过关游戏，主角雷曼是一个没有胳膊和腿的大鼻子家伙。雷曼可以跳跃，还能用他的头发短暂悬浮。他也可以通过扔出拳头进行攻击，或者蓄力打出更有力的一拳。他偶尔还能找到特殊的道具，获得无限飞行能力，从而穿越复杂的迷宫。
除了过关玩法，雷曼的另一大显著特点是其宏大、精细且充满活力的画面，这使它在同类型游戏中脱颖而出。

NAME: Ruiner Pinball
DESC:
Ruiner Pinball is a collection of two fantasy pinball tables: Ruiner and Tower.
Ruiner is a two screen wide table that features flashy scaling and rotation effects. There are lots of ramps and animated moving targets to score on.  Ruiner has a cold war nuclear holocaust theme.
Tower is an extra-tall table that features a medieval horror motif. Like Ruiner, it contains animated targets and scaling effects.  Both tables contain missions, or series of targets to increase the scoring opportunities available.
DESC_ZH:
《毁灭者弹珠台》包含两张奇幻弹珠台：“毁灭者”和“塔楼”。
“毁灭者”是一张双屏宽的弹珠台，具有华丽的缩放和旋转效果。有许多坡道和可动画移动的目标可供得分。“毁灭者”以冷战核灾难为主题。
“塔楼”是一张超高的弹珠台，具有中世纪恐怖主题。和“毁灭者”一样，它也有可动画的目标和缩放效果。两张弹珠台都设有任务，即一系列目标，以增加得分机会。

NAME: SkyCopter II (USA) (Proto)
NAME_ZH: 空中直升机2（美国版）（原型版）

NAME: SuperCross 3D
DESC:
Supercross 3D brings the excitement of arena supercross racing to the Jaguar.  Not only do you get to race ahead of your competitors, you can catch big air on the huge jumps and perform a few tricks.
There are three game modes: Practice, Single Race, and Tournament. In practice mode, you can race around any track for as long as you like.  In single race mode, you compete in one race against the computer.  Finally, in tournament mode, you compete in a series of races to accumulate points and become the Supercross champion.
DESC_ZH:
《3D 超级越野赛》将竞技场超级越野赛的刺激体验带到了捷豹主机上。你不仅能在比赛中领先于竞争对手，还能在巨大的跳跃坡道上高高跃起，并做出一些特技动作。

游戏有三种模式：练习模式、单场比赛模式和锦标赛模式。在练习模式中，你可以在任意赛道上尽情驰骋。在单场比赛模式中，你将与电脑进行一场比赛。最后，在锦标赛模式中，你要参加一系列比赛来积累积分，成为超级越野赛冠军。

NAME: Syndicate
DESC:
In the future, the world is controlled by a handful of global corporations (syndicates).  You are the Marketing director (hit man) for one of these companies.  It is your job to take control away from the competitors.  The job is not one of diplomacy, but one of brute force and physical control.  Advance your way to the top of the corporation by successfully completing your missions and managing the money you make from your territories.
The gameplay is visually reminiscent of X-Com, with an angled top-down perspective, but it is real time rather than turn based. You have missions ranging from infiltrate and capture, to seek and destroy. In each of these you direct a team of four agents as they move through the world shooting at anything that gets in their way.
You can upgrade and modify your agents, as well as equip them with tools you have researched or liberated from opposing syndicates.  As you complete missions, you gain more funds to use for purchasing agents or researching upgrades and equipment.
DESC_ZH:
在未来，世界由少数几家跨国企业（犯罪集团）掌控。你是其中一家公司的市场总监（杀手）。你的任务是从竞争对手手中夺取控制权。这项工作靠的不是外交手段，而是暴力和实际控制。通过成功完成任务并管理从你的地盘获得的资金，一路晋升到公司高层。
游戏玩法在视觉上让人联想到《幽浮》，采用倾斜的俯视视角，但它是实时制而非回合制。你的任务范围从潜入和占领到搜索和摧毁。在每个任务中，你指挥一支由四名特工组成的小队，他们在世界中行动，向任何阻挡他们的东西开枪。
你可以升级和改造你的特工，还可以为他们配备你研发的或从敌对犯罪集团缴获的工具。随着你完成任务，你会获得更多资金，用于购买特工或研发升级和装备。

NAME: Tempest 2000
DESC:
Tempest 2000 is a remake/upgrade of the popular Atari vector graphics-based shooter.
Blast your way through over 100+ levels, shooting the creatures that come out from the other side of the web to drag you in. Collect power-ups (jump, AI robots and more) to trippy graphics and colorful explosions as a thumping techno-house soundtrack blasts in the background.
Collect enough bonuses, and be subjected to two different types of bonus rounds as you navigate through rings, or try to ride a spiral tube.
Also included in the gameplay is an intense two-player mode to team up with or go head to head against another player, or even play a version of the original arcade game. There are four modes of gameplay in all: Traditional Tempest, Tempest Duel, Tempest Plus and Tempest 2000.
Face the web....
DESC_ZH:
《时空风暴2000》是一款基于雅达利矢量图形的热门射击游戏的重制版/升级版。

你要在超过100个关卡中一路过关斩将，射击从网络另一端出现、试图把你拖进去的怪物。收集各种强化道具（跳跃、人工智能机器人等等），伴随着动感的高科技浩室音乐，欣赏迷幻的画面和绚丽多彩的爆炸效果。

收集足够的奖励，你将进入两种不同类型的奖励关卡，你可以穿越圆环，或者尝试在螺旋管道中穿梭。

游戏还包含紧张刺激的双人模式，你可以与其他玩家组队合作，也可以与他们一决高下，甚至还能玩原版街机游戏的版本。游戏共有四种玩法模式：传统时空风暴、时空风暴对决、时空风暴加强版和时空风暴2000。

直面这张网络……

NAME: Thea Realm Fighters
DESC: Thea Realm Fighters is a two-dimensional fighting game with digitized characters and graphics, featuring more than twenty-five playable characters, each one with four special moves and two finisher moves, four different gameplay modes with over 30 stages. In the single-player mode, the player has to defeat twelve CPU-controlled opponents and after doing so the player was going to face SurRaider, a powerful warrior from another dimension.
DESC_ZH: 《西娅：领域战士》是一款采用数字化角色和图形的二维格斗游戏，拥有超过25名可玩角色，每个角色都有四种特殊招式和两种终结招式，还有四种不同的游戏模式和30多个关卡。在单人模式中，玩家必须击败12名由CPU控制的对手，之后将迎战来自另一个维度的强大战士SurRaider。

NAME: Theme Park
DESC:
Dominating the exciting world of Theme Park ownership is your goal in this strategy game from Bullfrog. The first task is to set up your rides within the available land, structuring convenient paths and queues and ideally leaving some space for bigger rides once they become available, and include some lakes and trees to increase the park's allure. Rides range from Teacups and Haunted Houses to the biggest most elaborate roller-coaster you can design, and water rides that loop around other rides.
Shops must also be included, so that the visitors can buy food, drinks and souvenirs - the cunning player will combine salt, sugar and caffeine settings to maximize consumer interest. Staff must be hired to keep everything running smoothly, and they will only work for what they consider a fair rate of pay.
You are competing against other Theme Parks, so don't let them get an advantage over you - monitor your success in attracting customers and financial viability closely using the supplied statistics pages. More important, ensure that research is adequately funded to produce new rides.
It can be played in three modes - Sandbox level lets you concentrate on the park design elements, while Sim and Full add more strategic features.
DESC_ZH:
在牛蛙公司推出的这款策略游戏中，你的目标是主宰令人兴奋的主题公园经营世界。首要任务是在可用土地上设置游乐设施，规划便捷的通道和排队区域，理想情况下，为后续可解锁的大型游乐设施预留一些空间，同时设置一些湖泊和树木以提升公园的吸引力。游乐设施种类繁多，从茶杯旋转机和鬼屋到你能设计出的最大、最精致的过山车，还有环绕其他设施的水上项目。
还必须设置商店，以便游客购买食物、饮料和纪念品——精明的玩家会巧妙搭配盐、糖和咖啡因类商品，以最大限度地吸引消费者。你需要雇佣员工来确保一切顺利运行，而他们只会接受他们认为合理的薪酬。
你要与其他主题公园竞争，所以不要让对手占得先机——利用游戏提供的统计页面密切关注你在吸引游客和财务状况方面的表现。更重要的是，要确保为研发新游乐设施提供充足的资金。
游戏有三种模式可供选择——沙盒模式让你专注于公园设计元素，而模拟模式和完整模式则增加了更多策略性玩法。

NAME: Tiny Toon Adventures
DESC: "Tiny Toon Adventure" is a beta version of a demo game never published on the Atari Jaguar
DESC_ZH: 《小小乐一通大冒险》是一款从未在雅达利捷豹主机上发布的演示游戏的测试版。

NAME: Total Carnage
DESC:
The war of 1999 left the country of Kookistan in shambles. Naturally, a dictator named General Akhboob took control of the beleagured nation and began creating an army of radioactive mutants. With a virtually impenetrable stronghold, a bunch of hostages, and a legion of mutants under his command, the evil despot will stop at nothing but world domination. Only two men have the courage and idealistic naivete to take on Akhboob and his forces: Captain Carnage and Major Mayhem, also known as the Doomsday Squad.
As Captain Carnage or Major Mayhem, it is up to you or you and a friend (in simultaneous action) to rescue the hostages while shooting hundreds of mutants bent on your destruction. As you walk and run forward, backward, left, right, and diagonally through 20 battlezones of nonstop action, you'll always have your machine gun by your side. Additional weapons which you can find along the way include grenade launchers, rocket launchers, plasma machine guns, flame throwers, spray-fire rifles, defensive blades, and an assortment of bombs.
DESC_ZH:
1999年的战争让库克斯坦国陷入一片废墟。自然而然地，一位名叫阿克布将军的独裁者控制了这个饱受折磨的国家，并开始组建一支放射性变异人的军队。凭借几乎坚不可摧的据点、一群人质以及一群听命于他的变异人，这个邪恶的暴君一心只想统治世界，不达目的誓不罢休。只有两个人有勇气和天真的理想主义精神来对抗阿克布及其军队：卡内奇队长和梅杰·梅海姆少校，他们也被称为末日小队。

你可以扮演卡内奇队长或梅杰·梅海姆少校，你可以独自行动，也可以和朋友一起（进行同步行动），在射杀数百个一心想置你于死地的变异人的同时解救那些人质。当你在20个连续不断的战斗区域中前后左右、斜向地行走和奔跑时，你的身边总会有一把机关枪。你沿途还能找到其他武器，包括榴弹发射器、火箭发射器、等离子机关枪、火焰喷射器、速射步枪、防御匕首以及各种各样的炸弹。

FILE: Towers II - Plight of the Stargazer (USA, Europe).zip
NAME: Towers II : Plight of the Stargazer
DESC: Become one of four different characters as you are immersed within the strange happenings in the mystical land of Lamini. You must uncover the secrets as you explore Daggan's tower. Many before you have tried, but none have returned. First person perspective, full screen smooth scrolling, talk to others, refer to maps, collect 100's of items, encounter 100's of creatures, experience challenges in combat and spell casting. Hours and hours of entertainment with appropriate save features.
DESC_ZH: 当你沉浸在神秘的拉米尼大陆上发生的奇异事件中时，你可以成为四种不同角色之一。你必须在探索达根之塔时揭开其中的秘密。在你之前有许多人尝试过，但无人归来。游戏采用第一人称视角、全屏平滑滚动，你可以与他人交谈、查看地图、收集数百种物品、遭遇数百种生物，体验战斗和施法的挑战。游戏具备合适的存档功能，能为你带来数小时的娱乐体验。

FILE: Trevor McFur in the Crescent Galaxy (World) (Beta).zip
NAME: Trevor McFur in the Crescent Galaxy
NAME_ZH: 特雷弗·麦克弗之新月星系大冒险
DESC: The Crescent Galaxy has been attacked by an entity known as Odd-it. This creatures goal is to make everything odd, like it. You play Trevor McFur, a corporal in the Crescent Galaxy's chapter of the Interplanetary Defense squad and are sent in along with your feline partner Cutter to defeat Odd-it. The game is a side scrolling shooter featuring a wide variety of worlds and enemies to conquer. Throughout the game you can power your ship with newer and better weapons by shooting certain enemies and collecting the bonuses left behind.
DESC_ZH: 新月星系遭到了一个名为“怪奇体”的实体的攻击。这个生物的目标是让一切都变得像它一样怪异。你将扮演特雷弗·麦克弗，他是星际防御小队新月星系分部的一名下士，你将和你的猫科伙伴卡特一起被派去击败怪奇体。这款游戏是一款横向卷轴射击游戏，有各种各样的世界和敌人等待你去征服。在游戏过程中，你可以通过射击特定的敌人并收集它们留下的奖励，为你的飞船装备更新、更好的武器。

NAME: Troy Aikman NFL Football
NAME_ZH: 特洛伊·艾克曼美式橄榄球
DESC:
You and a friend can become star NFL players or choose to coach a team in this realistic rendition of the game of American football, endorsed by former Dallas Cowboys quarterback and Super Bowl champ, Troy Aikman. Choose to play alone against the system, or play against each other.
Pick from 3 play modes: Pre-season, Season, or Custom Generated (editable) season. There are also three skill levels: Rookie, Pro and Veteran.  You can design your own plays, customize your team, and save your team's stats. True-to-life playing surfaces have an effect on how your team performs and include grass, mud, dirt, snow, rain and turf. Listen to the roar of the crowd and other authentic stadium sounds as your plays are followed through.
DESC_ZH:
在这款逼真的美式橄榄球游戏中，你和朋友可以成为美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）的明星球员，也可以选择执教一支球队。该游戏得到了前达拉斯牛仔队四分卫、超级碗冠军特洛伊·艾克曼的认可。你可以选择独自与系统对战，也可以和朋友相互对战。

从三种比赛模式中进行选择：季前赛、常规赛季或自定义生成（可编辑）赛季。此外，还有三种难度级别：新秀、职业和资深。你可以设计自己的战术，定制你的球队，并保存球队的统计数据。逼真的比赛场地会影响球队的表现，场地类型包括草地、泥地、沙地、雪地、雨天和人造草皮。当你执行战术时，还能听到观众的欢呼声和其他逼真的体育场音效。

NAME: Ultimate Brain Games (USA) (Proto)
NAME_ZH: 终极脑力游戏（美国版）（原型）

NAME: Ultra Vortek
DESC:
Civilization has fallen into a deep decline.  Gangs and warlords are gaining power and influence all over the world.  Then out of nowhere, a powerful being known as the Gaurdian appears with a challenge.  Unless a warrior meets his challenge, he will destroy the Earth.  So, 7 warriors from around the world fight to re-open the Ultra Vortek and restore the Earth.
Ultra Vortek is a one-on-one fighting game similar to Mortal Kombat.  Some of the fighters are digitzed actors, other are stop motion or computer animated.  You have at your control an array of punches and kicks, and a large number of special moves.  The game also features several "finishing moves" for each of the 7 warriors.
DESC_ZH:
文明已陷入严重衰退。帮派和军阀在世界各地不断获取权力和影响力。这时，一个名为“守护者”的强大存在突然出现并发起挑战。除非有一名战士接受他的挑战，否则他将摧毁地球。于是，来自世界各地的7名战士为重新开启终极漩涡、拯救地球而战。
《终极漩涡》是一款类似于《真人快打》的一对一格斗游戏。部分格斗角色由真人演员数字化呈现，其他则采用定格动画或计算机动画制作。你可以控制一系列的拳打脚动作，还有大量的特殊招式。游戏还为7名战士各自设计了几种“终结技”。

NAME: Val d'Isère Skiing and Snowboarding
NAME_ZH: 瓦勒迪泽尔滑雪与单板滑雪
DESC:
Cut the slopes on some of the steepest mountainsides in SKIING AND SNOWBOARDING, a wild winter challenge where speed in guaranteed! Train and compete on the breathtaking slopes of France's world-famous Vald-Isère Ski Resort. Race against time and friends in slalom, giant slalom and downhill events.
Watch out for trees, snowmobiles and sno-cats as you barrel down windswept mountainsides, black ice, and moguls.
DESC_ZH:
在《滑雪与单板滑雪》中，于一些最陡峭的山坡上驰骋雪道，这是一场狂野的冬季挑战，速度绝对有保障！在法国举世闻名的瓦勒迪泽尔滑雪场那令人叹为观止的雪道上训练和竞技。在回转、大回转和速降项目中与时间赛跑，和朋友一决高下。
当你冲下狂风呼啸的山坡时，要小心树木、雪地摩托和雪地履带车，还有黑冰和雪包。

NAME: Virtual VCS
DESC: Virtual VCS is an unreleased Atari 2600 game collection for the Atari Jaguar. It includes the games Combat, PacMan, Adventure, Yars' Revenge, Defender and Berzerk.
DESC_ZH: Virtual VCS是一款未发行的、适用于雅达利捷豹主机的雅达利2600游戏合集。它包含了《战斗》《吃豆人》《冒险》《亚尔斯的复仇》《守护者》和《疯狂》等游戏。

NAME: White Men Can't Jump
DESC:
This is the game of basketball the way many people learn to play it - in the city streets - with loose rules and in various suburban locales. Inspired by the 1992 film about high stakes street basketball gambling, in this game you can wager how much you want on each game.
The action is seen from the half court line, with a screen view that pans and zooms to follow the action. Aside from a goal tending penalty and the need to clear the ball, anything goes. For instance, steals are effected by shoving an opponent and making a grab for the ball.
Your goal is to get enough money to enter, and win, the tournament. If you make $5000, you instantly get entered into the tournament. You have the ability to save your game in this mode so that you can come back later if you run short on time and don't want to lose all your money.
Opt for a single game or the Slam City tournament, while game options determine time limits, scoring system, and control schemes. There are fifteen teams to choose from, and up to four players can get in on the action (with the Jaguar Team Tap adapter included with the game).
DESC_ZH:
这是一款许多人学习打篮球的方式——在城市街道上，规则宽松，场地多样，包括郊区。这款游戏灵感源自1992年那部关于高风险街头篮球赌博的电影，在游戏中，你可以为每场比赛下注，想下多少就下多少。

游戏视角从半场线展开，屏幕会平移和缩放以跟随比赛动态。除了干扰球判罚和需要将球传出三分线外，几乎没有其他限制。例如，你可以通过推搡对手并抢夺球来完成抢断。

你的目标是赚取足够的钱参加并赢得锦标赛。如果你赚到5000美元，就会立即获得参加锦标赛的资格。在这个模式下，你可以保存游戏进度，这样如果你时间不够又不想输光所有钱，之后还能接着玩。

你可以选择进行单场比赛或参加“灌篮之城”锦标赛，同时游戏选项可以设置时间限制、计分系统和操作方案。有十五支球队可供选择，最多四名玩家可以一起参与游戏（游戏附带美洲豹团队手柄适配器）。

NAME: Wolfenstein 3D
DESC:
id software's adaptation of their classic first-person shooter Wolfenstein 3D to consoles is not a straight port, but a remix with substantial changes as well as new additions.
While the basic gameplay of exploring levels, shooting enemies, collecting treasures, keys and power-ups remain the same, only half of the original game's 60 levels have been retained. Each of those 30 levels (grouped into six missions, with two levels being secret ones) is a simplified version of an original level. The end bosses for the missions are taken from both Wolf3D as well as its sequel, Spear of Destiny.
Other changes from the original include new power-ups: an ammo box (taken from Spear of Destiny) and backpack that increases the maximum amount of ammo that can be carried.
The original's weapons (knife, pistol, machine gun, chaingun) all return, but there are also two completely new tools of destruction: a flame thrower and a rocket launcher.
DESC_ZH:
id软件公司将其经典第一人称射击游戏《德军总部3D》移植到主机平台，这并非简单的移植，而是一次进行了重大改动并添加了新内容的重新混音之作。
虽然探索关卡、射击敌人、收集宝藏、钥匙和道具的基本玩法保持不变，但原版游戏的60个关卡仅保留了一半。这30个关卡（分为六个任务，其中两个关卡为隐藏关卡）均是原版关卡的简化版本。每个任务的最终BOSS既取自《德军总部3D》，也取自其续作《命运之矛》。
与原版相比，其他改动还包括新增了道具：一个弹药箱（取自《命运之矛》）和一个可增加最大弹药携带量的背包。
原版的武器（刀、手枪、机关枪、链式机枪）全部回归，但也新增了两种全新的破坏工具：火焰喷射器和火箭发射器。

NAME: Zero 5
DESC: ZERO 5 is a futuristic space shooter set in a 3-D, 360 degree playfield. The year is 2044 and the battle for Earth has begun. On the far reaches of the galaxy, a massive invasion force is assembling. Scanners at DEFCON have alerted you to the alien threat. The Earth's best pilots are dispatched in their BAMBAM cruisers to engage the enemy. Multiple weapons, driving soundtrack, non-stop combat, multiple power-ups, and 15 extended missions contribute to a shooters game with real depth.
DESC_ZH: 《零号战机5》是一款设定在3D、360度游戏场景中的未来太空射击游戏。故事发生在2044年，地球保卫战已经打响。在银河系的边缘，一股庞大的入侵力量正在集结。国防状态扫描系统已向你发出外星威胁警报。地球最优秀的飞行员驾驶着他们的“砰砰”巡洋舰出击迎敌。多样的武器、动感的配乐、不间断的战斗、多种强化道具，以及15个拓展任务，共同打造出一款极具深度的射击游戏。

NAME: Zool 2
DESC:
The sequel to Zool sees him take on the bad guys Mental Block and Krool across 15 levels.
Zool 2 is a platform game where you control the titular "Ninja of the Nth Dimension" (or his girlfriend, Zooz, who can complete each level in a slightly different way) as he rampages through a variety of levels, collecting countless tasty treats, shooting any enemies that he encounters and finding bonuses (there's a variety of special power-ups Zool can find - for example, a bomb that follows him and can be blown up at any time to remove on-screen enemies, or a temporary invulnerability). New to the sequel is Zool's ability to scale walls and his new spinning attacks. 
On each level you have to collect a certain amount of the featured fruit within an allocated time limit, and then find the exit across the multi-directionally-scrolling levels. There are lots of hidden areas to see, including a bonus Breakout game starring Zool's pet 2-headed dog.
DESC_ZH:
《祖尔》的续作中，祖尔要在15个关卡中对抗反派“思维障碍”和克鲁尔。
《祖尔2》是一款平台游戏，在游戏中你将操控主角“第N维度忍者”（或者他的女友祖兹，她通关每个关卡的方式略有不同），让他在各种关卡中横冲直撞，收集数不清的美味零食，射击遇到的任何敌人，并寻找奖励（祖尔能找到各种特殊道具——例如，有一个会跟着他的炸弹，可随时引爆以清除屏幕上的敌人，或者获得暂时无敌状态）。续作新增了祖尔攀爬墙壁的能力和新的旋转攻击。
在每个关卡中，你必须在规定时间内收集一定数量的特色水果，然后在多方向滚动的关卡中找到出口。有很多隐藏区域值得探索，其中包括一款以祖尔的双头宠物狗为主角的奖励弹球游戏。

NAME: Zoop!
DESC:
Fast-paced action-puzzle game where the player eliminates colored shapes that are approaching his alter ego, another colored shape, before they reach the top, ala Tetris.
In order to eliminate the other shapes, you must point your piece at it and 'fire'. If the shape is the same color as your piece, the shape is eliminated, as well as all of the shapes of the same color behind it, until your piece hits a piece of a different color. If the shape is of a different color, or it is hit when collecting a line of similar shapes, your piece exchanges colors with the shape.
DESC_ZH:
这是一款快节奏的动作解谜游戏，玩家需要在彩色形状到达顶部之前将其消除，玩法类似《俄罗斯方块》。玩家操控另一个彩色形状，消除向其逼近的彩色形状。
为了消除其他形状，你必须将自己的形状对准目标并“发射”。如果目标形状与你操控的形状颜色相同，那么该形状以及它后面所有相同颜色的形状都会被消除，直到你的形状碰到不同颜色的形状为止。如果目标形状颜色不同，或者在收集一排相同形状时被击中，你的形状会与目标形状交换颜色。
